# EnumExtensions.GetPropertyName method

Returns the value of attribute of type EnumDescriptionAttribute for this enum value. If this attribute is not defined returns null (Nothing in Visual Basic)

```csharp
public static string GetPropertyName(this Enum value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | Target enum value. |

## Return Value

A String that contains the value of attribute.
